nodes.text: Salina was an Ewok female member of an Ewok tribe who was an acquaintance of Princess Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka. In 3 ABY, she was talking with Kintaka when the two discovered a damsel flower that the Fleebogs had left for the princess. Kintaka pointed out the flower to Salina, who noted that she had never seen anything like it.

The pair then went off the show the rest of the village, but when they did, the medicine man Logray noticed what kind of plant it was, and he instructed Kintaka to drop it immediately. However, it was too late, and Kintaka began shrinking until she was small enough to fall through a crack in the village platform as Salina watched.
Salina had blue-and-brown fur and black eyes. She wore a yellow hood that had a miniature star affixed to it.
Salina appeared in the eleventh issue of the Ewoks comic series, which was written by David Manak, illustrated by Warren Kremer, and published on September 30, 1986.
